Project_Title: Serum Exosomal sRNAs for Acute Rejection Patients
Project_Description: Our study demonstrated that the expression of exosomal miRNAs in AR patients are significantly different from that of non-AR patients, by serving as novel diagnostic biomarkers for AR in liver transplant patients.
